name: Doors Open
details: Doors generally open in the morning for ticket sales.

name: Daytime Sessions
details: Gameplay generally begins shortly after doors open. Jackpot-style games may be featured.

name: Afternoon Play
details: Progressive or special daytime games are commonly offered later in the afternoon.

name: Evening Session
details: Evening session sales usually begin in the late afternoon. Sessions often conclude later in the night.

name: Late Night
details: Additional fast-paced or shorter-format games may be offered following evening sessions.
